title: Video Editor for long and short form
job_overview:
Are you are Premiere Pro editor?

Big YT channel with more than 5M subscribers looking for top video editor. If you are creative, efficient, and want your edits to reach millions of viewers, then we are looking for you!

Job description:

Remote Video editor for long and short form videos

Qualifications:
Proficient in Premiere Pro
Creative and efficient
Fluent in English
Stable internet and electricity
Prior experience in editing for overseas clients are a definite advantage

Work days are Monday to Friday, 8 hours a day. Philippine timezone. 
Rates start at $4.30 per hour. You get paid bi-weekly.

Please share your portfolio and CV for consideration. Please put the keyword "CHARGER" in your message title. Applications that do not follow these last two instructions will not be entertained.
